description:
Ichigo has entered his inner world and is blocking fierce attacks made by another Ichigo who wields a white Zangetsu. Ichigo is cornered as images of Byakuya Kuchiki and Jin Kariya pummel him into the ground. Kenpachi Zaraki appears and tells Ichigo to be candid about his desire to fight and questions his determination. Meanwhile, Captain Hitsugaya and Rangiku are setting up a massive communication device at Orihime`s house so they can contact the Soul Society.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Annonce Urgente ! Le plan terrifiant d`Aizen
Kinkyuu Houkoku! Aizen no Osorubeki Keikaku!
緊急報告! 藍染の恐るべき計画
